decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( Letter dated 1 February 2016; Water calculations received 4 April 2016; 4920IN00, 01A, 02A, 03A, 04, 05, 06 received 09/01/2015, 4920DE10A, 11C, 12C, 13C, 14F, 15E, 16H, 17G, 18D, 19D, 20G, 21G, 236A, 237A, 238A received 03/06/2015 and planning decisions 00607/191-195/P1(2), 00607/191-195/P1(3), 00607/191-195/P1(6i) and 00607/191-195/P1(10)) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 2 - The windows on the west and east elevations marked as obscure glazed on the drawings shall be obscure glazed and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
Condition : 3 - Within three months of the date of this decision, evidence (e.g. photographs, installation contracts and as-built certificates under the Standard Assessment Procedure shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to show that the development has been constructed in accordance with the approved Energy Strategy (NRG Consulting, December 2014) and any subsequent approved revisions.
Condition : 4 - No dwelling shall be occupied until arrangements have been agreed in writing with the local planning authority and put in place to ensure that, with the exception of disabled persons, no resident of the development shall obtain a resident's parking permit within any controlled parking zone which may be in force in Brentford at any time.
description:
Removal of condition 8 (code for sustainable homes) of permission 00607/191-195/P1 dated 09/06/2015, for  erection of a fourth storey to provide eight flats, replacement of windows erection of 36 balconies to the first and second floor elevations, rendering and feature wall
sections to existing elevations and extension of canopy to the main entrance
